Text: Wow.  I should have come back to check on this long ago.  I have no idea why these are Real Media files, seeing as how I don't have Real Media Player, but you're right.  Thanks for catching that and reseeding as FLAC (here: http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3898433/Camelot-Original_Broadway_Cast_[FLAC] ).  I will continue to seed this for any who want it in RM format.
